sentences.english: And the children of Israel gave to the Levites these cities with their suburbs.
sentences.chinese: 以色列人將這些城與其郊野給了利未人。

sentences.english: All the towns for the priests, the descendants of Aaron, were thirteen, together with their pasturelands.
sentences.chinese: 亞倫子孫作祭司的共有十三座城，還有屬城的郊野。

sentences.english: To construct drainage adits within the boundary of the Pok Fu Lam Country Park and Special Area.
sentences.chinese: 於薄扶林郊野公園及特別地區內建造地下排水道。

sentences.english: I don’t want them to rot in no-man’s land.
sentences.chinese: 我不想讓他們在荒郊野外腐爛。

sentences.english: To carry out landslip preventive works which include earthworks for slopes within country park.
sentences.chinese: 在郊野公園內進行防止山泥傾瀉工程，包括土木工事。

sentences.english: You started to think polar bear thoughts about icyness and wilderness.
sentences.chinese: 你開始想北極熊所想，想冰封的大地，想荒郊野外。

sentences.english: Earthworks and building works in the Lantau South Country Park.
sentences.chinese: 於南大嶼山郊野公園內進行土木工事及建築工程。

sentences.english: All these ten towns and their pasturelands were given to the rest of the Kohathite clans.
sentences.chinese: 哥轄其餘的子孫共有十座城，還有屬城的郊野。

sentences.english: And they gave them Hebron in the land of Judah， and the suburbs thereof round about it.
sentences.chinese: 在猶大地中得了希伯侖和四圍的郊野。

sentences.english: The localities of its occurrence are in Country Parks under protection.
sentences.chinese: 其分佈點在郊野公園內，生境受到保護。

sentences.english: Country parks are set up to conserve our natural environment.
sentences.chinese: 興建郊野公園是爲了保護我們的自然環境。

sentences.english: With that, she was turned into a large stone and was placed in the wilderness.
sentences.chinese: 於是女孩變成一塊大石頭，躺在荒郊野外。

sentences.english: In Hong Kong, the locality of its occurrence is within Ma On Shan Country Park under protection.
sentences.chinese: 在香港其生長地點在馬鞍山郊野公園內，受到保護。

sentences.english: How can we learn from the country parks?
sentences.chinese: 我們從郊野公園裏能學到什麼？

sentences.english: And they gave them Hebron in the land of Judah, and the suburbs thereof round about it.
sentences.chinese: 在猶大地中得了希伯侖和四圍的郊野。

sentences.english: Qian'an Luan river countryside park, located at the edge of the city, has small stamina development.
sentences.chinese: 遷安灤河郊野公園地處城市邊緣，開發後勁小。

definition: lit. tread the green; go for a walk in the spring (when the grass has turned green)/spring hike season around Qingming festival 清明, 4th-6th April
Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
